description: Retrospective approval for the installation of a basement level electricity sub-station to service new development (see ref P051898 & P051897).  Electricity sub-station located to rear of 25 Goswell Road (development at 7-13 Clerkenwell Road; 17 charterhouse Building; Heart & Cancer Centre Charterhouse Square & 25-25b Goswell Road).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  A report on the archaeological works surrounding the substation and the adjoining wall shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority within 3 months of the date of this decision. The archaeological works shall be carried out by a suitably qualified investigating body acceptable to the Local Planning Authority.

REASON:  The development of this site is likely to damage archaeological remains.  The applicant should therefore submit detailed proposals in the form of an archaeological project design.  This design should be in accordance with the appropriate English Heritage guidelines.
